code: export const convertUrlToFile=async url=>{const response=await fetch(url);const data=await response.blob();const extend=url.split('.').pop();const fileName=url.split('/').pop();const meta={type:`image/${extend}`};return new File([data],fileName,meta);};export const convertUrlsToFile=async urls=>{const files=[];for(const url of urls){const file=await convertUrlToFile(url);files.push(file);}return files;};
